title.en: Methodology of Mother Tongue for Children with SEN II
title.et: Eesti keele õpe erivajadustega lastele II

description.en: Different text types in pedagogical practice.  The aptness of texts for achieving learning objectives. The stages of constructing texts. Adaptation of content and linguistic complexity of texts.
description.et: Teksti liigid õppetöös. Teksti sobivus õpieesmärkide täitmiseks. Tekstide koostamise etapid. Tekstide sisuline ja keeleline kohandamine.

objectives.en: To develop theoretical knowledge of text construction and adaptation and to teach to construct and adapt texts considering the learning aims/objectives.
objectives.et: Kujundada teoreetilised teadmised tekstide koostamisest ja kohandamisest ning õpetada koostama ja kohandama tekste õpieesmärkidest lähtuvalt.

learning_outcomes.en: The student knows the stages of constructing and adapting texts.
learning_outcomes.et: Üliõpilane teab teksti koostamise ja kohandamise etappe.

learning_outcomes.en: The student constructs different types of pedagogical texts.
The student adapts different types of pedagogical texts.
